title: Font viewer for my website
content:
Greetings,  
 I am looking for a script to install on my web site where a customer can type in their printing information & see how it will look to view the different fonts we offer available for them to order.  
 as like this showing  
 [http://www.typetester.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829041525/http:/www.typetester.org/ "http://www.typetester.org/")

I was wondering if anyone would be able to help me learn or know where to go for such a script to do this on my web site or if you offer this.

Thank you for your time  
 Edward
author: EzPerkins
